definition: to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to
10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
to remind/to call attention to/to warn of
to rouse/to be woken by sth/to wake with a start/to sleep lightly
to come to/to awaken/to regain consciousness
to awaken/to come to realize/awakened to the truth/the truth dawns upon one/scales fall from the eyes/to become aware
to awaken/to wake sb up/to rouse
to come to oneself/to come to realize/to come to see the truth/to wake up to reality
to dissipate the effects of alcohol/to sober up

sentences.english: So then, let us not be like others, who are asleep, but let us be alert and self-controlled.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們不要睡覺，像別人一樣，總要儆醒謹守。

sentences.english: I hope this coffee may sober him up.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這杯咖啡能使他醒醒酒。

sentences.english: But we have to give Lee the benefit of the doubt.
sentences.chinese: 但我們有必要用懷疑給李提一下醒。

sentences.english: It has been real resting, for I could consistently sleep until naturally wake up.
sentences.chinese: 真的是休息了，每天都睡到自然醒。

sentences.english: She told us to go outside, get some air, and sober up.
sentences.chinese: 她讓我們出去透透氣，醒醒酒。

sentences.english: The most woeful thing is hand twitching wakes you up and cash counting ending naturally.
sentences.chinese: 睡覺睡到手抽筋，數錢數到自然醒。

sentences.english: Ye Fan saw the children have awaked, then went to the school.
sentences.chinese: 葉樊看到孩子醒了，纔去了學校。

sentences.english: I awoke when my brother threw the dog to my bed.
sentences.chinese: 我弟弟把小狗扔到我牀上時我醒了。

sentences.english: When he woke up, Tao went to tell Zhang about his dream.
sentences.chinese: 當他醒後，陶告訴張他做的夢。

sentences.english: But I woke up when I heard him in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 不過聽見他在廚房裏的動靜我就醒了。

sentences.english: An early morning alarm gets my daughter, Morgan, up for summer school.
sentences.chinese: 一大早鬧鐘鈴響就鬧醒女兒茉苷去上暑期學校。

sentences.english: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們不要睡覺，像別人一樣，總要儆醒謹守。

sentences.english: Wake me up with your lips .
sentences.chinese: 以你的柔嫩的雙脣吻醒我吧。
醒着的夢遊，真實的自我。

sentences.english: Meanwhile at the industrial site Nina wakes up.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，在工業區，尼娜醒了過來。

definition: to awaken/to wake sb up/to rouse
to rouse/to be woken by sth/to wake with a start/to sleep lightly
